name: The ImPECKable Eggsy
description:
CONTROLS:

Left/Right Arrows - boost Eggsy in that direction

Spacebar - boost Eggsy upwards

Don't let the golden egg touch the ground or the walls - it is extremely fragile and may shatter!

STORY:

You are playing as Eggsy, a secret pigeon spy (but not the brightest of the bunch). He's been sent on some of the harder missions, and it's your job to help him grab and bring back the golden egg while navigating the bunkers as quickly as possible.
